metadata.name: DNS Query To Put.io - DNS Client
metadata.comment: Detects DNS queries for subdomains related to "Put.io" sharing website.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM dns_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND metadata.event_code = 3008 AND (contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('api.put.io')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('upload.put.io'))))

output.summary: Detects DNS queries for subdomains related to "Put.io" sharing website.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate DNS queries and usage of Put.io Reference: https://darkatlas.io/blog/medusa-ransomware-group-opsec-failure
